body_html:
This is a rare kind of failure, so we did not need to check this before.
But the scripts are also checked into git:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/pip.sh#L318
It should already crash if pip fails but somehow, it is moving forward to running tests.
I am happy to review any PRs to fix it.

body:
This is a rare kind of failure, so we did not need to check this before.
But the scripts are also checked into git:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/pip.sh#L318
It should already crash if pip fails but somehow, it is moving forward to running tests.
I am happy to review any PRs to fix it.
